source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_00<tab>Yalfort is so engrossed in the slip of paper in his hands that he barely notices your approach. Do try not to startle him.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_00<tab>Yalfort a une bonne nouvelle à vous annoncer.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_01<tab>Though it may seem that Yalfort never budges from his usual spot, he assures you that he has been busy preparing for your next expedition into the Empty. Ryne and Gaia then make a timely appearance and regale you with tales of their activities in the Crystarium, which range from fairly constructive to...eating biscuits. There will, however, be ample time for further discussion aboard the skyslipper, which is ready and waiting at the Derrick.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_01<tab>Yalfort vous a fait savoir que tout était fin prêt pour votre prochaine expédition. Il est temps de retourner dans Le Grand Vide pour y découvrir comment la situation a évolué... Commencez par vous rendre à La Guette pour y retrouver Ryne.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arrival at the outpost, Gaia rather uncharacteristically offers to help by piloting the skyslipper. It appears that during her time in the Crystarium, she has learned not only to control this complex, shoe-like craft, but she has also gained a degree of consideration for others. You had best hop aboard before she changes her mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_02<tab>Alors que Ryne vous avait proposé de prendre les commandes de l'aéroglisseur, Gaïa a insisté pour vous faire la dé<var 16 /var>mon<var 16 /var>stra<var 16 /var>tion de ses nouveaux talents de pilote. Parlez à votre nouvelle conductrice lorsque vous serez <var 08 E905 ((prête)) ((prêt)) /var> à partir pour Le Grand Vide.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_03<tab>The long and normally dreary voyage across the Empty is made far more pleasant by lively conversation. Sadly, this buoyant mood is short-lived as you are met with an unwelcome sight when you reach your destination. The once-lush and verdant plant life is drained of color and vitality, much to your dismay. The crystal that towers about the camp has taken on an ominous, white glow, indicating that the balance between Darkness and Light has shifted in favor of the latter. Suddenly, Gaia clutches her head, and it becomes all too clear that her ordeal is far from over.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_03<tab>Après un plaisant trajet en aéroglisseur, vous avez eu la mauvaise surprise de constater que toute la végétation du Grand Vide était flétrie. Mais au moment où Gaïa supposait que le pouvoir de la Lumière de Ryne avait provoqué une réaction indésirable, la voix de sa “fée” s'est de nouveau fait entendre...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_04<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_SEQ_04<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ryne at the Derrick.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Ryne, à La Guette

target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Gaïa

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! So the rumors of your knack for being in the right place at the right time are true! You see, we've just completed our preparations for another expedition into the Empty.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, quelle bonne surprise<var 1D /var>! Vous serez <var 08 E905 ((heureuse)) ((heureux)) /var> d'apprendre que tout est prêt pour votre prochaine expédition dans Le Grand Vide.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_001<tab>Miss Ryne and Miss Gaia agree that it's high time you all went to see how things are coming along. Though I must say, being at their beck and call night and day does test my patience on occasion.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_001<tab>J'ai également prévenu mesdemoiselles Ryne et Gaïa, qui ne devraient plus tarder désormais.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_002<tab>(-???-)Well, well. Fancy seeing you here.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_002<tab>Tiens, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> est là aussi. Bon timing<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_100_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_100_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_003<tab>We were just getting ready for another ride on the skyslipper. Care to join us?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_003<tab>On pensait justement aller vérifier l'état du Grand Vide. Vous voulez bien vous joindre à nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_004<tab>There was one other thing I should mention before you depart. Now that the situation in Eulmore has settled down somewhat, my associates have made some headway in investigating your past, Miss Gaia.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_004<tab>Ah, j'allais oublier. La situation s'étant considérablement stabilisée à Eulmore, nous venons de lancer une enquête approfondie sur les origines de ma<var 16 /var>de<var 16 /var>moi<var 16 /var>sel<var 16 /var>le Gaïa.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_005<tab>...Is that so?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_005<tab>Ah bon...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_006<tab>Hmm? I thought that's what you wanted.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_006<tab>Ça ne te fait pas plaisir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_007<tab>So did I. But I quite like the way things are now. Digging around in my past might...I don't know, spoil it somehow.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_007<tab>... J'ai aucun souvenir du moment où je vous ai attaqués, mais je sais que vous m'avez accueillie comme une amie alors que j'étais une parfaite étrangère pour vous. Ça m'a beaucoup touchée, et je voudrais pas tout gâcher...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_008<tab>Besides, uncovering the truth behind the voice in my head and my strange powers is bound to be more interesting than whatever life it was I had in Eulmore.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_008<tab>Aujourd'hui, plus que mes origines, c'est la vérité qui se cache derrière ma fée que j'aimerais connaître. Ça, et pourquoi je peux contrôler le pouvoir des Ténèbres...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_009<tab>I understand. We'll find the answers. Together. Just like we do everything else.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_009<tab>Je comprends... Ne t'en fais pas, on trouvera les réponses à ces questions <var 1A 02 /var>ensemble<var 1A 01 /var>, comme on a l'habitude de le faire.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A1_000_001<tab>Did you make that necklace?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A1_000_001<tab>Avez-vous fait con<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>ner ce fameux collier<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A1_000_002<tab>How were the coffee biscuits?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A1_000_002<tab>Comment étaient ces biscuits au café<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_010<tab>You mean from the ice crystal we found after the battle? I was sure it would've melted by now, but it seems Ryne was right.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_010<tab>Avec le cristal de glace éternelle qu'on a ramassé<var 1D /var>? Ryne avait raison, il n'a pas fondu, finalement.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_011<tab>And yes, we had it made into a necklace. She insisted that I have it, even though it doesn't suit me at all. Still, I suppose it makes a nice memento, so I keep it somewhere safe.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_011<tab>On a demandé à un artisan d'en faire un collier, mais c'était vraiment pas mon style... Du coup, j'ai préféré le ranger dans ma boîte à bijoux.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_012<tab>Oh, come on, Gaia! It'd look lovely on you! Wait...you're not embarrassed to wear it, are you?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_012<tab>Je ne comprends pas pourquoi tu dis ça, il t'allait tellement bien<var 1D /var>! Tu ne serais pas plutôt gênée de le porter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_013<tab>Don't be silly, of course I'm not! In any case, I wouldn't want to lose it while we're in the Empty. Unlike the coffee biscuits you've brought along, I can't just go and buy another one.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_013<tab>Moi, gênée<var 1D /var>!? Et puis quoi, encore<var 1D /var>! Non, j'aurais trop peur de le perdre dans Le Grand Vide. Il est unique, pas comme les biscuits que tu as tenu à apporter...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_014<tab>Ah! They were supposed to be a surprise for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_014<tab>Tu m'avais promis de garder le secret<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_015<tab>Oh, they were delicious, as always! But I hear they're quite fattening, so we usually just buy one and have half each.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_015<tab>Meilleurs que jamais<var 1D /var>! Mais ils sont tellement riches qu'on a préféré en acheter un seul et faire moitié-moitié.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_016<tab>And then you always get another one anyway.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_016<tab>Oui, et comme ça ne t'a pas suffi, on a fini par en prendre un autre...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_017<tab>Yes, but we break that in half too, so it's fine.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_017<tab>C'est vrai, mais on l'a partagé aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_018<tab>Then we may as well have one each to begin with! Honestly, Ryne, I sometimes wonder if you've got biscuits for brains.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_018<tab>À ce compte, on aurait pu en avoir un chacune dès le début<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_019<tab>Though I must say, my time in the Crystarium has been rather enjoyable. We even had a chance to make a necklace from the ice crystal we found.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_019<tab>En tout cas, on a passé un bon moment. Et puis on en a même profité pour faire un collier avec le cristal qu'on avait trouvé la dernière fois...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_020<tab>And in case you were wondering, I haven't been neglecting my training. I wouldn't want my skills to get rusty just because Thancred's not around. I'm ready for whatever lies ahead!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_020<tab>Je tiens à préciser que je n'ai pas oublié mon en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment à la pistolame. Même sans Thancred, je continue à m'exercer d'arrache-pied.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_021<tab>Urianger would also be pleased to hear you've had your head in those fusty old tomes. I've even done a bit of studying myself. After all, it's up to us to take care of the Empty now.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_021<tab>Bravo<var 1D /var>! Maintenant qu'il est reparti dans son monde, c'est toi qui reprends le flambeau<var 1D /var>! Sans lui et Urianger, c'est à nous de redonner vie au Grand Vide.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_022<tab>I'm looking forward to seeing how things have changed since our last visit. Come on, let's head over to the Derrick.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_022<tab>Oui, et c'est exactement ce qu'on va faire. Rendez-vous devant l'aéroglisseur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_030<tab>I'm hoping that one of these days <var 1A 02 /var>I'll<var 1A 01 /var> be allowed to visit the Empty and see those remarkable changes for myself. It seems like a fair reward for all my hard work!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_YALFORT_000_030<tab>J'ai hâte de pouvoir me rendre dans Le Grand Vide pour admirer le fruit de vos efforts, une fois que tout cela sera terminé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_031<tab>This time, those giant ant things had the good sense to leave us alone on our way here. Seems they've learned their lesson.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_031<tab>Yalfort et Lewrey sont bien gentils de s'occuper de l'entretien de l'aéroglisseur, mais s'ils pouvaient le garer un peu plus près de Mord Souq, ça serait pas du luxe<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_040<tab>I don't suppose you fancy taking the helm this time?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous voulez bien prendre les commandes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_041<tab>Wait. I'll pilot this time.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_041<tab>Aujourd'hui, c'est moi qui pilote<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_042<tab>Oh? I didn't realize you knew how!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_042<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Quand est-ce que tu as appris<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_043<tab>While you were off training, I was practicing with another skyslipper they have at the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_043<tab>Tu crois quand même pas que je passe mon temps à me tourner les pouces<var 1D /var>? Je me suis entraînée sur un modèle identique que m'a prêté Lewrey.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_044<tab>Really? That's fantastic!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_044<tab>Vraiment<var 1D /var>? C'est génial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_045<tab>Hardly. You've been pulling more than your own weight, and I just wanted to do what I can to contribute more.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_045<tab>Il était temps que je fasse ma part du travail, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_046<tab>So you two can sit back, relax, and leave it to me.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_046<tab>Asseyez-vous confortablement, je me charge de tout.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_050<tab>Well, Gaia certainly kept that quiet! She's just full of surprises, isn't she?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_050<tab>Je ne savais pas que Gaïa prenait des cours de pilotage. Elle cache bien son jeu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_060<tab>There's no need to look so apprehensive, you know. Let's get going, shall we?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_060<tab>Bon, et si on y allait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_070<tab>It's so strange suddenly seeing you at the controls. Why didn't you tell me you'd been practicing?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_070<tab>Super, tu te débrouilles vraiment bien<var 1D /var>! Pourquoi tu ne m'as pas dit que tu t'entraînais<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_071<tab>I thought I'd surprise you, that's all.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_071<tab>Hé hé... Parce que je voulais te faire la surprise. Disons que j'avais envie de me rendre utile, au lieu de vous laisser faire tout le travail.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_072<tab>Well, consider me surprised. All this time, I thought you were only good for smashing things with your hammer.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_072<tab>Tu te débrouillais déjà pas mal avec ton marteau, pourtant.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_073<tab>Hmph! Bring that up again and you can walk the rest of the way.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_073<tab>Eh bien maintenant, je suis aussi une as du volant... enfin, du guidon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_074<tab>Hehe, I'd best behave. I wouldn't want to get stranded in the Empty and miss the festival.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_074<tab>Au fait <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, avez-vous entendu parler de la “fête du cristal” qui se prépare à Cristarium<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_075<tab>Ah, I suppose this is the first you would've heard of it. We haven't exactly been keeping it a secret, but it's still in the planning stages.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_075<tab>Il s'est passé tellement de choses depuis que vous et vos amis avez permis à la nuit de revenir sur Norvrandt... Les Cristariens ont à peine eu le temps de se remettre de leurs émotions qu'ils ont dû s'adapter à une toute nouvelle vie.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_076<tab>You see, the return of the night sky has brought lots of changes. And while everyone is glad, the reality is it's also been quite stressful, having to adapt to a new way of life.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_076<tab>L'avenir apparaît radieux et l'optimisme est de mise, mais une certaine fatigue commence à se faire sentir. Surtout chez les adultes, qui ne lésinent pas sur les efforts pour le bien de la cité.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_077<tab>Seeing how hard our elders are working to keep the Crystarium running, youths like myself came up with the idea of hosting an event as way of expressing our appreciation.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_077<tab>Pour exprimer leur recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, plusieurs jeunes de Cristarium ont ainsi eu l'idée d'organiser cette fameuse “fête du cristal”. Leur comité recrute justement des membres à l'heure actuelle.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_078<tab>Once we return from the Empty, I'll be helping as one of the organizers.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_078<tab>C'est une belle initiative, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Quand nous en aurons fini avec la revitalisation du Grand Vide, j'ai bien l'intention de me mettre à leur disposition<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_Q2_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A2_000_001<tab>I'd be happy to help─provided I'm suitably compensated.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A2_000_001<tab>Je serai là si on a besoin de moi.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A2_000_002<tab>I'd offer to help, but I think you have everything well in hand.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_A2_000_002<tab>J'ai hâte de participer aux festivités<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_079<tab>Haha, I doubt we could afford the services of a great hero such as you, but thanks for offering. If everything goes well, all you'd need to do is turn up and enjoy yourself!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_079<tab>Hi hi, si <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var> de Cristarium propose ses services, je ne vois pas qui pourrait refuser<var 1D /var>! Ceci dit, c'est aussi une bonne occasion de vous reposer... Et si vous profitiez de la fête, pour changer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_080<tab>I wouldn't be so sure about that...but I'd try my best to make it a success. If everything goes well, all you'd need to do is turn up and enjoy yourself!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_080<tab>Inutile de préciser que <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var> de Cristarium sera l'<var 08 E905 ((invitée)) ((invité)) /var> d'honneur de la fête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_081<tab>How about you, Gaia? Would you like to help with the festival?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_081<tab>Et toi, Gaïa<var 1D /var>? Tu n'as pas envie de te joindre à nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_082<tab>Wh-What's that? I...er, haven't been listening.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_082<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>? Pardon, j'étais ailleurs...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_083<tab>My...ah...leg is cramping up a bit. Piloting this thing must've made me more tense than I'd realized.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_083<tab>C'est la première fois que je conduis aussi longtemps, je suis un peu fatiguée...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_084<tab>Then let one of us take over!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_084<tab>Tu es sûre que ça va aller<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_085<tab>No, I'll be fine.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_085<tab>... Oui, t'en fais pas pour moi.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_086<tab>Well, as long as you're sure. But if you feel like switching places, just say the word.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_086<tab>Attention à ne pas t'endormir au volant... pardon, au guidon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_087<tab>No... How can this be?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_087<tab>Oh non...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_088<tab>I think <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> explains it...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_088<tab>Regardez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_089<tab>Light... Does this mean there's still too much of it in the Empty?
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_089<tab>Cette lueur... C'est une réaction à l'éther de Lumière...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_090<tab>Hmm... I'm no expert, but this might be a result of losing control when you restored the ice element. Even though I tried to use Darkness to hold back the Light spilling forth, it seems it wasn't enough.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_090<tab>Quand on a revitalisé la glace, ton pouvoir s'est emballé et j'ai essayé de le contenir avec les Ténèbres... On dirait bien que ça n'a pas suffi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_091<tab>Then we're right back to where we started. This is all my fault...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_RYNE_000_091<tab>Avec ça, nous voilà <var 08 E905 ((revenues)) ((revenus)) /var> au point de départ... Tout est de ma faute<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_092<tab>No, Ryne. You mustn't blame yourself.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_092<tab>Ryne, il faut pas t'en vouloir comme ça...

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIAVOICE_000_093<tab>You have returned to me!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIAVOICE_000_093<tab>Tu es enfin revenue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_094<tab>Unnngh...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_094<tab>Aaargh...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIAVOICE_000_095<tab>Restore the Darkness, while you still can!
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIAVOICE_000_095<tab>Tu dois redonner vie aux Ténèbres, avant qu'il ne soit trop tard<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_096<tab>A familiar voice, an inescapable fate.
The promise of salvation at the precipice of ruin.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_096<tab>J'entendais l'appel d'une voix familière, qui m'invitait à la rejoindre dans son utopie.

source: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_097<tab>In the remnants of a lost past, I would find my truth.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA301_03975_GAIA_000_097<tab>C'était en Éden, où résonnait mon passé oublié, que cette bataille allait se dérouler pour la troisième fois.
